name: Emergency Care
description: Immediate medical attention and treatment for critical conditions and injuries.

name: Primary Care
description: General medical care, preventive services, and routine check-ups for patients of all ages.

name: Surgery
description: Wide range of surgical procedures for various conditions, including minimally invasive and robotic-assisted surgeries.

name: Laboratory Services
description: Diagnostic tests, blood work, and other laboratory investigations to aid in diagnosis and treatment.

name: Imaging Services
description: Advanced imaging techniques such as X-rays, CT scans, MRI scans, and ultrasounds for accurate diagnosis.

name: Maternity Care
description: Prenatal care, delivery services, and postpartum care for expectant mothers and newborns.

name: Pediatrics
description: Specialized care for infants, children, and adolescents, including preventive care, vaccinations, and treatment of childhood illnesses.

name: Cardiology
description: Comprehensive heart care services including diagnosis, treatment, and management of heart conditions.

name: Orthopedics
description: Diagnosis and treatment of musculoskeletal conditions, including joint replacements, sports injuries, and fractures.

name: Physical Therapy
description: Rehabilitation services to restore mobility, strength, and function after injury or surgery.
